scripts.prepare-install: npm run install-phonemes && npm run install-animation
scripts.build-pack: rimraf dist && microbundle src/index.ts --output dist/index.js --format modern,cjs && npm run ~copy-package && npm run ~pack-dist
scripts.dev-pack: rimraf dist && microbundle src/index.ts --output dist/index.js --format modern,cjs --sourcemap --no-compress && npm run ~copy-package && npm run ~pack-dist
scripts.~copy-package: ncp package.json dist/package.json && node ../../build-tools/replace-content/index.js dist/package.json file:../../pran-phonemes file:../../../pran-phonemes && node ../../build-tools/replace-content/index.js dist/package.json file:../../pran-animation file:../../../pran-animation
